extendedInfo.description: Denne app viser byvejr fra DMI.VIGTIGT: - DMI tillader kun at jeg bruger byvejret for Danmark, derfor er det ikke muligt at vise verdensvejr, regionaludsigten, radar osv.- Hvis du har Ã¸nsker til app'en eller oplever problemer sÃ¥ skriv til mig i en email istedet for i en anmeldelse her i Google Play. Jeg kan ikke svare tilbage herfra.App'en indeholder 2 forskellige widgets der kan vises pÃ¥ din telefons forside.Du vÃ¦lger selv om du vil bruge app'en, widgets eller begge dele.App'en kan ved opstart konfigureres til en specifik by eller til automatisk valg af by ud fra din lokation.Herefter kan du tilfÃ¸je sÃ¥ mange widgets du vil og konfigurere dem enkeltvis til specifikke byer eller automatisk valg af by. StÃ¸rrelsen af ââwidget kan Ã¦ndres efter den er tilfÃ¸jet ved at holde fingeren nede pÃ¥ widget'en, slippe og derefter trÃ¦kke i rammen omkring widget'en for at Ã¦ndre stÃ¸rrelsen.Byvejret i app'en og eventuelle widgets opdateres automatisk efter et konfigurerbart interval.

reviews.title: Finally!!
reviews.comment: A very fine app, Indeed! It gets the job done, by bringing the weather to the widgets. Much like the old DMI titled something along the lines of \'Forecast for/from DMI\'. This app does a better job at offering the 9-day forecast, too, and the option to choose between many (preset) update intervals.  CAN 110 % BE RECOMMENDED OVER THE CURRENT OFFICIAL DMI APP, IF THE PURPOSE OF USE IS THE WIDGETS OPTION!! ^_^
reviews.author: Christoffer H

reviews.title: Finally a meteogram widget
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using \"Meta widget\" earlier but this is simpler. The DMI city meteograms are great but their app stinks. It would be nice to be able to select cities outside Denmark, for example Malm\303\266 in the list.
reviews.author: Martin Bengtsson

reviews.title: L\303\246kkert
reviews.comment: Rigtig fedt at der er mulighed for at f\303\245 dmi som widget igen, den brokkede sig over at der ikke var mere plads p\303\245 mit tomme home screen, men fik den da addet til sidst :-)
reviews.author: Mikkel Krogh

reviews.title: Bedre end den officielle
reviews.comment: Fantastisk widget, ville bare \303\270nske at billedet var centreret i det valgte omr\303\245de, s\303\245 det s\303\245 ordentligt ud b\303\245de i landskab og portr\303\246t...
reviews.author: Daniel Dalskov

reviews.title: Perfekt
reviews.comment: Andre vejr apps (som fx DMI) kan godt pakke sammen. Hurtig, pr\303\246cis og nul BS. :)
reviews.author: Niklas Bo Hemicke Greve

reviews.comment: Not working anymore after worked properly for a few weeks.  Tried to reinstall but still not work
reviews.author: yingluk kanchanaroek

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: It just does what it has to do. Thumbs up for the support too.
reviews.author: David Garcia

reviews.title: Spot on!
reviews.comment: Exactly what is needed to get a fast overview of todays weather!
reviews.author: Brian Hekto S\303\270rensen

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does what it is supposed to
reviews.author: Rasmus Thystrup Karstensen

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Virker som den skal og nu med GPS lokation - tak Uffe
reviews.author: Alex Berg

reviews.title: Basic, but perfect.
reviews.comment: Simpler than the other DMI apps, but works so much better.
reviews.author: Jesper Hansen

reviews.title: Hurra!
reviews.comment: L\303\246kkert at nogen endelig har lavet en widget der viser byvejr. Forslag: flere widget st\303\270rrelser, fx 3x2 p\303\245 tablet; 9-dages udsigt i widget; mindre dagsudsigt i widget (fjern ?mode=long i URL); mulighed for at se radar og nedb\303\270rs animationer direkte i  appen, og m\303\245ske i widget?
reviews.author: Tommy Hemmert Olesen

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is what dim widget is missing. It shows the city weather on hourly basis as on byvejr on dmi webpage.
reviews.author: Wajahat Kazmi
